message.body:
>>490fa28a3a
I recommend a privacy faced browser.
I personally use Iridium. Iridium is a privacy focused chromium browser without all the crap that (((google))) use to spy on you.
You should never trust Google. 
They are led by a Pajeet Dalit and sell your personal information to Israel.

For more information, contact my friend Miya on twitter dot com at BPD_GOD. I stan.
